translations: vi.垂涎，流口水（salivate 的过去式和过去分词）
vt.使……过量分泌唾液（salivate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Pavlov discovered that when dogs were fed meat powder they salivated.
sentences.translation: 巴甫洛夫发现当喂狗吃肉末的时候它们就留口水。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the effect of neuromuscular electrical stimulation (NMES) on salivated children with cerebral palsy.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨神经肌肉电刺激(NMES)对脑瘫患儿流涎的影响。

sentences.sentence: Scores of articles fretted over how the joint rise of "the Dragon" and "the Elephant" would challenge the west-or salivated over the countries' massive markets.
sentences.translation: 几十篇文章对“龙”“象”的联合崛起将怎样挑战西方国家表达了忧虑之情——或是大肆宣扬两个国家的巨大市场。
